ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@willinet.net] Sent: October 10, 1999 6:49 PM To: shadowknight@onelist.com Subject: [shadowknight] MM faction From:
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: October 10, 1999 6:49 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] MM faction


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

method 1: kill bard npcs scattered across antonica. if you are a dark elf,
ogre, or troll, this isnt much trouble, since you will never be walking past
a bard guild anyway. possibly problematic for human sk tho.

method 2: kill the REAL princess lenya in highkeep (the one upstairs). this
results in a HUGE faction increase with MM, but also a HUGE faction decrease
in gfay. so watch your step ;)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro

Killing this princess sounds like what I'd do, now the question is (and I'm
surprised no one else has raised it) is what level is she?
